title: iPad mini 6 joins Twelve South’s library of signature vintage leather BookBook cases
content:
Today, Twelve South is bringing its signature vintage leather-bound book aesthetics to Apple’s latest compact iPadOS device for the first time. The new BookBook case for iPad mini 6 arrives with the usual premium stylings we’ve come to expect from the brand in a new design fit for elevating the look of the miniature tablet.

more…

The post iPad mini 6 joins Twelve South’s library of signature vintage leather BookBook cases appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Twelve South is adding the new iPad mini 6 BookBook case to its library of signature leather bound vintage book-style covers.
